section.heading: Opinion Announcement of John G. Roberts, Jr.

turn.speaker: john_g_roberts_jr
turn.label: Chief Justice John G. Roberts, Jr.
turn.text: In case 11-9953, Boyer versus Louisiana, the petition for a writ of certiorari is dismissed as improvidently granted.
Justice Alito has filed a concurring opinion in which Justices Scalia and Thomas have joined.
Justice Sotomayor has filed the dissenting opinion in which Justices Ginsburg, Breyer, and Kagan have joined.
